item.title: AZ-77 North at AZ-79
item.description: AZ-77 North at AZ-79 North in Pinal County.

item.title: AZ-77 North at AZ-79
item.description: AZ-77 North at AZ-79. Continue north on AZ-77 to Globe and Oracle. Turn left for AZ-79 north to Florence and Phoenix.

item.title: AZ-77 North Approaching AZ-79
item.description: AZ-77 North approaching AZ-79 in Pinal County.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at US-70
item.description: US-60 west/AZ-77 south at US-70. Turn left for US-70 and to continue south on AZ-77. Turn right to continue west on US-60.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South approaching US-70. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-70 west/AZ-77 south for Tucson (via AZ-77) and Safford (via US-70). This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 south approaching US-70. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-73
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-73 east to Fort Apache, White River, and Fort Apache National Historic Park. Continue west on US-60 for Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching AZ-73
item.description: US-60 west/AZ-77 south approaching AZ-73.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South leaving Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-260 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Turn right to continue on AZ-260. Continue straight for US-60 West/AZ-77 South.

item.title: US-60/AZ-77/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60/AZ-77/AZ-260 west at AZ-260 west to Overgaard and Fool Hollow Lake Recreation Area. US-60 West/AZ-77 South continues to AZ-73 Jct. AZ-260 west leaves US-60/AZ-77 here.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260. Use AZ-260 west for Heber and Payson. Continue on US-60 West/AZ-77 South for Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-260 West/AZ-77 South
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-260 West/AZ-77 South in Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Turn left for AZ-260 west; continue straight for US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Use AZ-260 west for Pinetop/Lakeside. AZ-260 joins US-60 West/AZ-77 South through Show Low. Use US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West for Payson and Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South approaching AZ-260 in Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-77. Turn right for AZ-77 north. Continue straight for US-60 west and AZ-77 south. AZ-77 joins US-60 west to Globe.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-77. Use AZ-77 north for Holbrook. Continue west on US-60 and AZ-77 south for Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-77.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 292
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 292 - AZ-77 North/Keams Canyon. AZ-77 north leaves I-40 here, and heads north onto the Hopi Indian Reservation.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 289
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 289 - BL-40/Navajo Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Shield
item.description: I-40 East, Arizona, shield in Holbrook.

item.title: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North at I-40
item.description: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North at I-40 freeway entrance. Use I-40 west for Flagstaff; use I-40 east for Albuquerque. AZ-77 joins I-40 east through Holbrook.

item.title: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North at I-40
item.description: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North at I-40 freeway entrance. Use I-40 west for Flagstaff; use I-40 east for Albuquerque. AZ-77 joins I-40 east through Holbrook.

item.title: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North Approaching I-40
item.description: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North approaching I-40. AZ-77 joins I-40 east through Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-77 North/BL-40 East Approaching I-40
item.description: AZ-77 North/BL-40 East approaching I-40. AZ-77 north joins I-40 east to the east side of Holbrook.

item.title: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North - Arizona Scenic Byway
item.description: BL-40 east/AZ-77 north in Holbrook. BL-40 in Holbrook follows the historic route of US-66 and is signed as an Arizona Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-77 North at BL-40
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-77 North at BL-40. Continue straight for BL-40 East/AZ-77 North (Navajo Blvd.). Turn left for BL-40 West/US-180 West (Hopi Drive).

item.title: AZ-77 North/US-180 West at BL-40
item.description: AZ-77 North/US-180 West at BL-40 in downtown Holbrook. Continue straight on Navajo Blvd. for AZ-77 North/BL-40 East. Turn left on Hopi Drive for US-180 West/BL-40 west.

item.title: AZ-77 North/US-180 West Approaching BL-40
item.description: AZ-77 north/US-180 west approaching BL-40 in Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-77 North To I-40
item.description: AZ-77 north to I-40 (and US-180 west which is not signed) in Holbrook.

item.title: South Apache Dr. at AZ-77 and US-180
item.description: S. Apache Dr. at AZ-77 and US-180. Use AZ-77 south for Snowflake; use AZ-77 north/US-180 west for Holbrook; use US-180 east for Petrified Forest.

item.title: AZ-77 North at US-180
item.description: AZ-77 north at US-180. Use US-180 east for St. Johns; use US-180 west/AZ-77 north for Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-77 North at US-180
item.description: AZ-77 north at US-180. Turn right for US-180 east; continue north on AZ-77 for US-180 east to I-40.

item.title: AZ-77 North Approaching US-180
item.description: AZ-77 North approaching US-180. US-180 joins AZ-77 into Holbrook.

item.title: End AZ-377 at AZ-77
item.description: End AZ-377 at AZ-77. Use AZ-77 north for I-40.

item.title: AZ-377 North Approaching AZ-77
item.description: AZ-377 north approaching AZ-77.

item.title: End US-70 West at US-60 and AZ-77
item.description: End US-70 west at US-60 and AZ-77. AZ-77 turns north here onto US-60 east.

item.title: End US-70
item.description: End US-70 approaching US-60/AZ-77 Jct.

item.title: US-70 West/AZ-77 North at US-60/AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at US-60/AZ-77 junction. Use US-60 East/AZ-77 North for Show Low and Springerville. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-60
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-60. AZ-77 north has been following US-70 west, and turns onto US-60 east. This is the western terminus of US-70.

item.title: US-70 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at AZ-77. AZ-77 joins US-70 west into Globe.

item.title: US-70 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at AZ-77. Use AZ-77 south for Winkelman and Tucson. Continue west on US-70/AZ-77 north for Globe.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west approaching AZ-77

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 255
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 255 - AZ-77 North/Miracle Mile. I-10 continues east to El Paso.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 254
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 254 - AZ-77 North/Miracle Mile.
